captions.text: ## [ Circus ]

- [ Tires Screech ]
- Oh, wait. You see that ?
This is the place, man.

They'll never
fuck with us here.

Where's the ether ?
Mescaline's not working.
Oh.

There we go.
Right.
[ Mumbles ]
Yeah. Why not ?

[ Groans ]
Yeah.

[ Inhales ]
Mm-hmm.

[ Duke Narrating ]
Ahh. Devil ether.

lt makes you behave like the village
drunkard in some early Irish novel.

Total loss of all
basic motor skills.

Blurred vision,
no balance, numb tongue.
The mind recoils in horror...

unable to communicate
with the spinal column...

which is interesting because
you can actually watch yourself
behaving in this terrible way...
but you can't control it.
## [ Continues, Distorted ]

You approach the turnstiles
and know that when you get there...

you have to give the man two dollars
or he won't let you inside...

but when you get there
everything goes wrong.

Some angry Rotarian shoves you and
you think, ''What's happening here ?''

-You hear yourself mumbling:
-Dogs fucked the Pope. No fault of mine.
## [ Continues, Distorted ]

Ether is the perfect drug
for Las Vegas.

ln this town they love a drunk.
Fresh meat.

- Come on, buddy. Come on.
- Holy--

So they put us through the turnstiles
and turned us loose inside.

title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas (4/10) Movie CLIP - Devil Ether (1998) HD

comments.text:
Hunter was a total Shaman. Did you know that most buddhists do drugs in the 
higher echelons of their temples. That's why yoga and qi gong was invented 
really. To counter act the effects drugs have on your CNS. When you get 
fucked up and just sit like a zombie you body becomes contorted and 
apathetic. But by doing posture correcting yoga poses and qi gong you can 
keep circulation running through your body﻿

comments.text:
Aro, this is true. The more psychedelics you do, pot included, the less 
you'll eventually have to take. This is because you know how to get to 
these realms of perception easier. They can be triggered by thoughts, as 
you said and a newbie doesn't think like an experienced Shaman.
comments.author: Jay Cee

comments.text:
I find it is controlled by what we direct our attention to , when tripping 
I can control the types of patterns . any sensation we pay attention to we 
give power to , sometimes I feel overwhelmed with philosophical concepts 
and knowledge  even fractured thought patterns and deconstructed ego. I 
only do small amounts of psychedelics now because I find it more beneficial 
than bowing my mind as I have done before .
comments.author: arohawkno1

comments.text:
Yes, music and psychedelics are the two keys to piercing the veil as well. 
You need to think why you are having a bad trip, what's causing it. If its 
purely physical then, yeah, get into the rhythm of music or just relax and 
breathe. But it's never just physical, there's always a spiritual reason 
why a bad trip occurs.
comments.author: Jay Cee

comments.author: Steven Summers

comments.text:
This true. The real stuff is the way to go, without a doubt. But when you 
can end up doing jail time for a mere stem or seed from possession from the 
real, versus never risking failing a drug test even from the occasional 
buzz from synthetic, the choice becomes clear. Granted, the more 
intelligible way to go is nothing at all but I've never been a fan of 
alcohol or cocaine or anything but weed or shrooms. Hell, i don't even 
consume cigarettes. So a friend stops by and once in a while offers a buzz 
and I have nothing important to do at the time then I figure why not?
comments.author: Steven Summers

comments.text:
+Steven Summers man, I feel bad for you guys. I live in CA and there is an 
abundance of all different kinds of weed here from herb, to brownies, to 
wax (which is absolutely insane). To think that "synthetic weed", which 
I've tried, is anything like real weed or anything like this part in the 
movie is absolutely stupid. Time to grow up to the real stuff gentlemen.

comments.author: tehreporter

comments.text:
+tehreporter that isn't really a problem. you need to take a lot to pass 
out in the first place, and it evaporates so quickly that after about 20 
seconds there isn't any significant amount left on the rag. as for the 
comparison between ether and alcohol... they're very different. ether is so 
much better. the feeling of euphoria is a lot more intense, you don't get 
any sort of hangover or headache no matter how much you take, and you don't 
get the "low" feeling you get with alcohol... they're actually very 
different experiences. I wouldn't say this clip is an accurate 
representation of what it feels like.

I suggest you try it, just once. it is a very safe drug and VERY fun.
comments.author: knox140

comments.text:
The risk is passing out while the rag is still on your face.  Also, why do 
ether when alcohol is readily available.
comments.author: tehreporter

comments.text:
nah, it's about as safe as you can get in terms of drugs. you can't 
suffocate on it, but you can pass out. although even if you do pass out it 
doesn't cause any long term harm. so long as you do it in a safe 
environment, like your house, preferably with friends, you should be fine.

the only danger is its flammability. 

beyond that, it's a great drug, probably one of my favourites.
comments.author: knox140
